creditline: Gift of Yang and Helen H. Wang
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: standing man with long grey beard at left, holding a scepter; man wears green, red, black and tan robes with gold and white patterning; two crouching and one standing figure at left; two crouching figures collect white flowers; standing figure holds a red bowl partially covered by a green cloth with white patterning
title: Arhats, from an album of paintings
